name: Lose it
description:
L̴͕̳̑̊̔͑́͝ ̵͚̪͌͗́̅̔̇O̸̡̞̬͕̟̯͒ ̴̮̱̳̭͔̈́̚S̵̯͓̋ ̷͇̪̪̻͠Ë̶́̎̔̋ͅ ̴̨͔̥̥̫̀̒̀̚Į̵̦̲̔ͅ ̷̨̻͝͝T̵̼͔͍͆̆̄̅̐̿͛

l o s e i t is a pixel art adventure that follows the journey of your character who strangely finds themselves in a world that is not quite as it should be. You must navigate their doubts and insecurities through a series of unique and creative challenges.

l o s e i t features a unique colour palette, creative sound design and quirky mechanics that create an immersive and engaging atmosphere that draws the player into the world they find themself in. 

The controls are the standard WASD keys for movement, the space bar for jumping, and the right and left mouse buttons for the mechanics unique to the game. Holding RMB draws in objects which the player can hold, and holding LMB charges them up to be shot out. 

l o s e i t features both top-down and side-view perspectives, giving depth and variety to the experience. There are four levels in total, each building upon the core game mechanic introduced at the beginning of the game. The player must use their skill and wits to overcome obstacles, escape puzzles,  defeat enemies, and, in the end, triumph over their doubts and fears.

l o s e i t is a relatively simple concept that explodes with its art style, fun interactions and a unique world that you will want to explore and revisit time and time again.

w̶̹̕è̶̗̦͎̗̀̈́̋̋ ̶̖͍͓̙̖̼̾̃͒͑͘h̴̢̧̰̤̲͊̇̎̎̎̽ŏ̴͓͎͔͈̱̔͜p̴͚̱̳̹̅̑̀̊͝e̴̛̛̪̬̳͚̻̻̍̀͆ ̷̻̪̐̉̀̇ͅy̸̛̙̓͛͊õ̵̡͍ȗ̸̢̢̮̙͇̚͝ ̴̨̛͚̹̟͉̂͊̈̈́̒͗͜ẹ̴̡͎̰͕́͐n̷͖͈̠͙͂̍̍̉͌͆͝j̸̢̢̻͋̿ő̷͙̳̗̓̒͜y̵̛͓̭̌̾̈!̵̢̊̚͘͝ͅ
